Reviews.Title: Refurbished Dell D520 Laptop
Reviews.Author: N. Mancini
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 for my kids x-mas gifts. They looked brand new & work like it too!! Very happy to have the 90 day warranty & support as well, just in case! ;)

Reviews.Title: Limited Budget? Great  Buy!
Reviews.Author: Frederick H. Jackson "Spiritual Life"
Reviews.Content: This is my third refurbished laptop...like a good used car,if taken care of,it will last a long time..The Dell D520 with Windows 7 installed was a bonus.I bought this for my wife who needs are simple.I also bought this for its former use as a business computer .Having had it for over a month it works wonderfully.If you are not it need of of the latest bells and whistles,a refurbished is something to take a look at...Check that its done by a microsoft certified co.and that the certificate of authenticity is with it..good buy.

Reviews.Title: DELL LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: S SIMP "the jesus team"
Reviews.Content: I WOULD RECOMMEND ANYONE TO BUY THIS REFURBISH DELL LAPTOP IT WORKS GREAT I WOULD GIVE IT A 4 STAR THE SELLER WAS SO GOOD TO WALK MY DAUGHTER THROUGH IT FOR TO SET IT UP THANK YOU SHARON SIMPSON

Reviews.Title: Good for beginners
Reviews.Author: C. Nelson
Reviews.Content: I've had this laptop for 7 years now.  I haven't had any major problems with it in all that time, except just recently my number six key stopped working.  Otherwise, it can be a little slow at times, loading web pages.  However, there's no problem getting into Word or Excel, etc.  I think it would be good at this point for a beginner who wants a cheap laptop to do emails and basic Word letters and perhaps keep track of their checkbook on Excel.  It's not overly complicated, but it doesn't have a LOT of memory for storing pictures, but a beginner would be ok with the space it has.  I keep Norton Antivirus on it and renew every year for $49 and it's been worth it.  The screen is big and clear, and you can hook a mouse to it, printers, scanners etc.  Hope that helps.

Reviews.Title: Good Old DELL
Reviews.Author: normajeannelson
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the Laptop. It came on as soon as I hooked it up. I hope to enjoy the use of it for a long, long, time. The seller packaged it very safely and I received it today. Thanks a lot. NormaJean Nelson

Reviews.Title: Great Machine at a great price
Reviews.Author: Joseph Pendleton
Reviews.Content: Love everything about it, paid 8 times more for an HP with an i5 core and this little core duo does everything it can at a stageringly lower price would buy again if vendor had more available. Only thing I am missing is an HDMI output for a flat screen monitor.

Reviews.Title: Serves it's purpose.
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Robinson
Reviews.Content: Needed this for down loading monogram fonts, watching at dvds and making cds. Works great for all of the mentioned purposes. It's fast. Has an awesome preinstalled Roxio DVD playing system. Making cds is a breeze. I download most of my mp3 tracks from Amazon. Everything runs smoothly. I am enjoying this laptop. Blinks black lines sometimes, but not a real problem. Froze up a couple times, had to reboot and it came right back up. No long term problems so far.

Reviews.Title: good service
Reviews.Author: Morningwing
Reviews.Content: Good used computer. Had a problem with the battery.  However, Will talked me through it and ended up sending me a new battery.  Once I ordered a similar  computer from Heartland America..and  it was a beaten up pile of junk at a higher price.

Reviews.Title: Merry Christmas !!
Reviews.Author: William Sears
Reviews.Content: I ordered this starter computer for my Grandson  , It arrived in better condition than was described , Worked better than an old Latitude I previously owned , that I was totally satisfied with !!

Reviews.Title: For a used machine it works well.
Reviews.Author: John Horst
Reviews.Content: does what I want with no problems. I don't think I can say anything more. It's just a computer. That's all.

Reviews.Title: Better than advertised
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: This was the second used laptop I purchased this month (Not from this seller.)  I had to return the first one so I was not expecting much from a new vendor.  Big Surprise!!  The laptop came as advertised, with the correct OS and power cord. They even sent a nice set of instructions on what was installed and what to do if you have OS issues.  This laptop and vendor went above and beyond what was advertised!

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: daniel mcclellan
Reviews.Content: This lap top looks new and works new this company is great if u have a starter lap top or a high dollar laptop drop it pay a fraction of the cost save ur cash this laptop will perform well

Reviews.Title: works for what i bought for
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: ram tested not to good memory , hard drive did pass but works good. without do any test on it, no issues . I till like it ,work for what I bought for.

Reviews.Title: ok all around
Reviews.Author: neu.
Reviews.Content: I got this laptop for free as a replacement for my old laptop from a friend. It works OK. It's very slow and glitching up though (the bottom half of the screen is malfunctioning currently). In fact, as I am writing this review, it's going to die pretty soon. But overall it was OK, maybe good to use if you're living on the cheap or giving it to your kids and whatnot.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D520  Notebook
Reviews.Author: Kneepants
Reviews.Content: This is actually a D530.  Seller upgraded it because he was out of the D520.  He also included other accessories.  I could not be more pleased with the product.  It is exactly what I want.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Purchase
Reviews.Author: Lewis P. Hart
Reviews.Content: This is an exact replacement for one of my customers failed Laptops. It was chosen because of application, price and reliability.THe price was right, shipping great, and ordering was easy.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME BUY FROM JOHN AMRHEIN :D :D :D EXTREMLY HAPPY
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Alverio
Reviews.Content: I gave it some time to see if the laptop messed up and it hasn't it came with xp professional updated also with open office and a couple extra programs battery is good and every thing else to the last detail

Reviews.Title: great little machine
Reviews.Author: Michael Nolan
Reviews.Content: You couldn't ask for better except another gig of ram and/or a Dvd rewrite.For the money I'm thrilled and use it all the time.

Reviews.Title: Really Impressed
Reviews.Author: J Baby
Reviews.Content: I was really impressed the notebook was in excellent condition this was a early gift to someone and they sure are happy thanks so much.

Reviews.Title: could not connect to the internet
Reviews.Author: Walter Horn
Reviews.Content: This Laptop was located in St. Louis, MO.  The vendor blamed hurricane Sandy for all of the connection problems even though it was on the East Coast.
